医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
深入探讨罕见的性高潮后疾病综合症全面综述综合了目前关于性高潮后疾病综合症（POIS）的知识，这是一种以射精后一系列症状为特征的罕见疾病，强调需要进一步研究以了解其原因并开发有效的治疗方法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240317/Rare-condition-post-orgasmic-illness-syndrome-explored-in-depth.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240317/Rare-condition-post-orgasmic-illness-syndrome-explored-in-depth.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ea84a226-d144-4441-b9c4-f424cf68c1bc Sun, 17 Mar 2024 23:01:00 -0400 Rare condition post-orgasmic illness syndrome explored in depth
补充维生素 D 对高血压患者骨骼和心脏健康的益处有限研究评估了补充维生素 D 对高血压患者骨骼健康和心血管危险因素的影响，发现除了 PTH 水平外没有显着改善，凸显了维生素 D 代谢的复杂性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240317/Vitamin-D-supplementation-shows-limited-benefits-for-bone-and-heart-health-in-hypertential-患者.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240317/Vitamin-D-supplementation-shows-limited-benefits-for-bone-and-heart-health-in-hypertential-患者.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=54de582e-1bdc-4d28-98ad-937cf831380f Sun, 17 Mar 2024 22:21:00 -0400 Vitamin D supplementation shows limited benefits for bone and heart health in hypertensive patients
伊利诺伊州麻疹疫情凸显了疫苗接种的迫切需要研究报告称，伊利诺伊州五名未接种疫苗的儿童爆发了麻疹疫情，突显了该疾病即使在没有直接接触的儿童中也具有很高的传播性，这凸显了疫苗接种的至关重要性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240317/Measles-outbreak-in-Illinois-underscores-ritic-need-for-vaccination.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240317/Measles-outbreak-in-Illinois-underscores-ritic-need-for-vaccination.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8cb22684-3290-492e-a879-f922e5c40d68 Sun, 17 Mar 2024 22:01:00 -0400 Measles outbreak in Illinois underscores critical need for vaccination
揭示糖尿病肌肉修复的复杂性：呼吁有针对性的研究和治疗综述概述了糖尿病对骨骼肌再生的影响，强调需要集中研究和创新疗法来解决这一日益严重的健康问题。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240317/Unraveling-the-complexities-of-muscle-repair-in-diabetes-A-call-for-targeted-research-and-therapies.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240317/Unraveling-the-complexities-of-muscle-repair-in-diabetes-A-call-for-targeted-research-and-therapies.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e22ff5d0-d78a-4877-9fee-2e23ccaf49e0 Sun, 17 Mar 2024 21:42:00 -0400 Unraveling the complexities of muscle repair in diabetes: A call for targeted research and therapies
纳米颗粒增强姜黄中的姜黄素，增强健康益处研究探索了纳米颗粒增强姜黄素配方，有望通过提高生物利用度和生物活性来显着增强其健康益处，包括抗癌、抗氧化和抗炎作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240317/Nanoarticles-turbocharge-turmerics-curcumin-for-enhanced-health-benefits.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240317/Nanoarticles-turbocharge-turmerics-curcumin-for-enhanced-health-benefits.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b383402a-34e2-4ad6-b38b-515362727de4 Sun, 17 Mar 2024 20:55:00 -0400 Nanoparticles turbocharge turmeric's curcumin for enhanced health benefits
创新干预措施应对气候变化对心理健康的影响一项全面审查探讨了针对气候变化对心理健康不利影响的干预措施，强调了该领域的新颖性和当前干预措施的前景，特别是在低收入和中等收入国家。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240317/Innovative-interventions-combat-mental-health-impacts-of-climate-change.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240317/Innovative-interventions-combat-mental-health-impacts-of-climate-change.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8fb87eb4-b99e-4544-86d9-7276ee390e98 Sun, 17 Mar 2024 20:29:00 -0400 Innovative interventions combat mental health impacts of climate change
创新的左旋多巴输注泵试验显示出减轻帕金森症状的希望由辛辛那提大学研究人员共同领导的一项国际多地点 3 期试验发现，通过输液泵输送帕金森病药物可以安全有效地在较长时间内减轻症状。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240315/Innovative-Levodopa-infusion-pump-trial-shows-promise-for-reducing-Parkinsons-symptoms.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240315/Innovative-Levodopa-infusion-pump-trial-shows-promise-for-reducing-Parkinsons-symptoms.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d9be9536-2327-42c1-aed7-9381ac6250b7 Fri, 15 Mar 2024 19:55:00 -0400 Innovative levodopa infusion pump trial shows promise for reducing Parkinson's symptoms
科学家旨在了解为什么 T 细胞不能维持肿瘤中的能量T细胞通常被称为“刺客”或“杀手”，因为它们可以精心策划并执行追捕全身细菌、病毒和癌细胞的任务。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240315/Scientists-aim-to-understand-why-T-cells-do-not-sustain-energy-in-tumors.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240315/Scientists-aim-to-understand-why-T-cells-do-not-sustain-energy-in-tumors.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bf0aef79-f19b-4338-af9c-cc4902650a82 Fri, 15 Mar 2024 16:14:00 -0400 Scientists aim to understand why T cells do not sustain energy in tumors
研究人员吹响了加大对丧亲护理投资的号角丧亲之痛造成的公共卫生损失在医学文献中有详细记录，丧亲者面临许多不良后果的风险更大，包括心理健康挑战、生活质量下降、医疗保健忽视、癌症、心脏病、自杀和死亡。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240315/Researchers-sound-a-clarion-call-for-greater-investment-in-bereavement-care.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240315/Researchers-sound-a-clarion-call-for-greater-investment-in-bereavement-care.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=75caf2ad-a476-4d94-9181-7b2c39790f60 Fri, 15 Mar 2024 16:05:00 -0400 Researchers sound a clarion call for greater investment in bereavement care
99mTc-maraciclatide 具有作为早期子宫内膜异位症非侵入性检测的潜力该演讲总结了已知或疑似子宫内膜异位症患者的初步发现，这些患者使用 SPECT-CT 相机进行成像，随后接受了计划的腹腔镜手术，这是一种关键孔手术，以确定子宫内膜异位病灶的存在、不存在和位置。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240315/99mTc-maraciclatide-holds-potial-as-a-non-guarantee-test-for-early-stage-endometriosis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240315/99mTc-maraciclatide-holds-potential-as-a-non-guarantee-test-for-early-stage-endometriosis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f7a989e1-33b4-42ad-8870-1c803b274ac6 Fri, 15 Mar 2024 15:47:00 -0400 99mTc-maraciclatide holds potential as a non-invasive test for early-stage endometriosis
